external_references.description: Mac Threat Response, Mobile Research Team. (2020, August 13). The XCSSET Malware: Inserts Malicious Code Into Xcode Projects, Performs UXSS Backdoor Planting in Safari, and Leverages Two Zero-day Exploits. Retrieved October 5, 2021.

objects.description: [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) will create an ssh key if necessary with the ssh-keygen -t rsa -f $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa -P command. [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) will upload a private key file to the server to remotely access the host without a password.(Citation: trendmicro xcsset xcode project 2020)
